subject: Football
Super Bowl
lead_paragraph: The Giants are in a position to produce one of the greatest upsets in Super Bowl history, maybe even more important than the Jets’ 16-7 shocker over the Colts in the third Super Bowl.
snippet: The Giants are in a position to produce one of the greatest upsets in Super Bowl history, maybe even more important than the Jets’ 16-7 shocker over the Colts in the third Super Bowl.
